translation.en: I would like you to know, the only reason I'm doin' this
translation.zh:
我想告诉你
我拍摄这段影片的唯一理由

translation.en: is 'cause folks think they know me.
translation.zh: 是因为人们自以为了解我

translation.en: They think they know what I'm about, and the truth is, they don't know me.
translation.zh:
他们自以为了解我
但实际上 他们并不了解我

translation.en: Anyhoo, if, in the end, this helps some other people out, then that's cool too.
translation.zh:
无论如何 如果这到最后能帮到别人
那也挺好

translation.en: I consider myself abnormal.
translation.zh: 我认为自己异于常人

translation.en: But who wants to be like everybody else?
translation.zh: 但谁想跟其他人一样呢？

translation.en: Not I.
translation.zh: 反正不是我

translation.en: Some people call me a "freak."
translation.zh: 有人叫我“怪胎”

translation.en: And I hate that word.
translation.zh: 我讨厌那个词

translation.en: I don't believe in it, or better yet, I don't believe in one-word labels.
translation.zh:
我不吃这一套
也不喜欢给人贴上一个单词的标签

translation.en: But... what you gonna do?
translation.zh: 但…你能怎么做？

translation.en: You feel me?
translation.zh: 你能懂我吗？

translation.en: I love walking the beautiful and nitty-gritty streets of New York City.
translation.zh: 我喜欢行走在纽约美丽的真实街道上

translation.en: But, sometimes, walking the beautiful, nitty-gritty streets as a woman can be, well...
translation.zh:
但一个女人走在美丽的真实街道上
有时会很…

translation.en: brutal.
translation.zh: 闹心

translation.en: Peep this bullshit.
translation.zh: 你看闹不闹心吧

translation.en: Psst! Psst! Why don't you sit on my dick and peddle my balls? [laughs]
translation.zh: 不如你坐上来 咱俩来一发

translation.en: Excuse me, miss, but you so fine,
translation.zh: 打扰一下 小姐 你可真漂亮

translation.en: I'd drink a tub of your bath water out a champagne glass.
translation.zh: 我想用香槟杯喝你的洗澡水

translation.en: You wanna know why?
translation.zh: 知道为什么吗？

translation.en: 'Cause your mom's placenta was filled with holy water.
translation.zh: 因为你妈的胎盘里装满了圣水

translation.en: God blessin' you, girl! Mm! Good God!
translation.zh: 上帝保佑你 妞儿 上帝啊

translation.en: Cutie-ho, I bet you your farts smell like grape Jolly Ranchers,
translation.zh: 小可爱 我猜你的屁是葡萄硬糖

translation.en: Fruity Pebbles, and AriZona Iced Tea, all combined.
translation.zh:
果味麦片和亚利桑那冰茶
混合起来的味道

translation.en: Damn, what a combination!
translation.zh: 见鬼 这组合太妙了

translation.en: Sista, I'll go gay for you.
translation.zh: 姐妹 我会为了你变成同性恋

translation.en: You got me questionin' my whole sexual preference.
translation.zh: 你都让我怀疑起我的性取向了

translation.en: Damn, you so perfect.
translation.zh: 老天 你可真完美

translation.en: Baby girl, I just wanna play the drumroll to Phil Collins' song "In The Air Tonight"
translation.zh:
小宝贝 我想在你黝黑的右屁股瓣上
敲菲尔柯林斯的

translation.en: on your right black butt cheek.
translation.zh: 《今夜星光灿烂》

translation.en: Hey, boo, where's your crown at?
translation.zh: 好啊 美女 你的王冠呢？

translation.en: Stop frontin' like you're not a Nubian queen. Bang! Bang!
translation.zh: 别假装自己不是努比亚女王了

translation.en: Darling, you would be a terrific accessory to my impressive car collection.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 你会是我豪车的完美配件

translation.en: Do you see this watch? This is a platinum and gold Rolex.
translation.zh: 看见这块表了吗？铂金纯金名表

translation.en: You come with me, you'll have two and join me at the top.
translation.zh: 跟我走 我送你两块 让你过好日子

translation.en: Hot thang,
translation.zh: 辣妹

translation.en: you look so good, Jesus on the cross must be doin' your taxes.
translation.zh:
你好美
十字架上的耶稣帮你上税的吧

translation.en: I truly believe that there is only one person,
translation.zh: 我真心相信只有一个人

translation.en: only one in this world that is meant to be your soul mate, your lifelong companion.
translation.zh:
一个独一无二的人
注定成为你的灵魂伴侣 伴你一生

translation.en: Joke is, rarely do these two people hook up.
translation.zh: 问题是 这两人通常碰不到一起去

translation.en: They just... wander about aimlessly, lost in the sauce.
translation.zh: 他们只是漫无目的地游荡 迷失沉沦

translation.en: You know, God is a trickster.
translation.zh: 上帝是个骗子

translation.en: In life, God doesn't give you the people you want.
translation.zh: 上帝不会在你的人生里给你想要的

translation.en: Instead, he gives you the people you need.
translation.zh: 而是给你需要的

translation.en: Nola Darling...
translation.zh: 诺拉达琳…

translation.en: is my need.
translation.zh: 就是我需要的

translation.en: -♪ Girl, I love the way you release me ♪ -Another great lunch.
translation.zh: 又一顿美味的午餐

translation.en: How come we always make love in your bed?
translation.zh: 我们怎么总在你床上亲热？

translation.en: Now, you know I can only make love in my own lovin' bed.
translation.zh:
你知道我只有在我的爱床上
才能跟人亲热

translation.en: Besides, we ain't doin' it in your bed.
translation.zh: 而且我们又不能在你床上做

translation.en: So, does it possess... magical, mystical powers?
translation.zh: 这么说它有神秘的魔力？

translation.en: Now, I'm possessed.
translation.zh: 我被迷住了

translation.en: You think so, huh?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: -[tires screeching, glass breaking] -♪ Y'all want this party started, right? ♪
translation.zh: （#火星布莱克蒙）

translation.en: Yo! "What about Nola Darling?" What do you wanna know?
translation.zh: 诺拉达琳怎么样？你想知道什么？

translation.en: [scoffs] I think Nola's a freak.
translation.zh: 我觉得诺拉是个怪胎

translation.en: You know? You know? You know.
translation.zh: 你知道…

translation.en: Freaky-deaky, deaky-freaky, freaky to the deaky, deaky to the freaky.
translation.zh:
又怪又骚 又骚又怪
古怪到风骚 风骚到古怪

translation.en: Yo, check it. Most dudes want freaks.
translation.zh: 告诉你吧 大多数人都喜欢怪胎

translation.en: I do. I do. Do I? I do!
translation.zh: 我喜欢…我喜欢吗？我喜欢

translation.en: -Okay. -All right, moment of truth, baby. Ooh!
translation.zh:
-好吧
-好吧 让我看看它的庐山真面目

translation.en: -Damn. You okay if I put my bike here? -Yeah, it's fine.
translation.zh:
天啊 -我能把单车放这儿吗？
-可以

translation.en: Dag. It took you long enough to invite me in.
translation.zh:
见鬼 咱俩认识这么久
你才邀请我进来

translation.en: Dag, I don't just let anybody up in here.
translation.zh: 见鬼 我不经常邀请别人来

translation.en: -So, what, is "Mars" a nickname? -Nah, it's my government.
translation.zh:
-火星是绰号吗？
-不 当然是我的真名

translation.en: My mom, she named me Mars 'cause she said I'm outta this universe. A'ight?
translation.zh:
我妈给我起名叫火星
她说我跟外星人一样棒 懂吗？

translation.en: [Mars] Dope.
translation.zh: 酷毙了

translation.en: -It's not finished. -Still dope.
translation.zh:
-还没画完
-那也很酷

translation.en: -My born day is May 19th. -Happy early born day.
translation.zh:
-我生日是5月19日
-提前祝你生日快乐

translation.en: Mars, Malcolm X was born on May 19th too.
translation.zh:
火星
马尔科姆X的生日也是5月19日

translation.en: No disrespect. Denzel did the damn thing.
translation.zh: 无意冒犯 但丹泽尔演得真好

translation.en: -And got robbed of that Academy Award. -That was some shenanigans.
translation.zh:
-但奥斯卡奖被人抢了
-那是使诈

translation.en: Some subterfuge, straight skulduggery.
translation.zh: 是耍花招 是诡计

translation.en: He was too black, too strong. Al Pacino, though? Come on.
translation.zh:
他太黑了 太强了
而阿尔帕西诺？得了

translation.en: Don't hate on Al Pacino. Scarface, that's my joint.
translation.zh:
别抨击阿尔帕西诺
我喜欢他的《疤面煞星》

translation.en: You know what a make-up call is in basketball?
translation.zh: 你知道篮球比赛的补偿性判罚吗？

translation.en: Does Mars Blackmon know what a make-up call is in basketball?
translation.zh:
火星布莱克蒙知道
篮球比赛的补偿性判罚吗？

translation.en: Is Barry "White"? Is Al "Green"?
translation.zh: 巴里姓怀特吗？艾尔姓格林吗？

translation.en: Is James "Brown"? Is Prince "Purple"?
translation.zh: 詹姆斯姓布朗吗？普林斯穿紫衣吗？

translation.en: It was an Academy of Motion Pictures Arts and Sciences make-up call.
translation.zh: 那是美国电影艺术与科学学院的补偿

translation.en: Pacino got fucked four times.
translation.zh: 帕西诺陪跑了四次

translation.en: He got fucked over for The Godfather and The Godfather Part II, Serpico,
translation.zh:
《教父》、《教父二》、《冲突》
都没得奖

translation.en: and fucked again big time for Dog Day Afternoon.
translation.zh: 希望很大的《热天午后》又没拿到

translation.en: Damn, Sam.
translation.zh: 见鬼

translation.en: So... they gave Pacino his long-overdue Oscar,
translation.zh:
所以他们颁给帕西诺
一个迟到的奥斯卡奖

translation.en: and then Denzel gets his make-up call Oscar for Training Day,
translation.zh:
然后补偿给
《训练日》的丹泽尔一个奖

translation.en: which he should've won anyway, so the Academy still owes D another one.
translation.zh:
而那个奖本来就该是他的
所以学院还是欠丹泽尔一个奥斯卡

translation.en: And I know they better not fuck him over for Fences.
translation.zh: 他们最好别让《藩篱》再陪跑

translation.en: Word to the mother. You know a lot about movies, huh?
translation.zh: 我同意 你挺了解电影啊？

translation.en: -I'm a cinephile. -A cine-what?
translation.zh:
-我是个影咖
-影什么？

translation.en: A cinephile. A film enthusiast.
translation.zh: 影咖 电影爱好者

translation.en: Well, you know, I wanna be a phile-cine wit' you.
translation.zh: 好吧 我也想跟你一样当“咖影”

translation.en: -A what? Cinephile. -My bad. My bad.
translation.zh:
-当什么？是“影咖”
-我的错…

translation.en: Mars, you are cuckoo for Cocoa Puffs. You know that?
translation.zh: 火星 你知道吗？你真是个疯子

translation.en: -Yo, this whole spot is yours? -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 这整个地方都是你的？

translation.en: I likes. I likes.
translation.zh: 我喜欢…

translation.en: What's the rent?
translation.zh: 租金多少？

translation.en: This is gentrified Fort Greene. You already know.
translation.zh: 这里是士绅化街区格林堡 你知道的

translation.en: You need a roommate?
translation.zh: 你需要室友吗？

translation.en: Motherfucker, you smokin' K2?
translation.zh: 混蛋 你嗑药磕嗨了吗？

translation.en: I let you up in here one time, and right away, you wanna move in?
translation.zh: 我才让你上来一次 你就想搬进来

translation.en: -Seriously? -Eh--
translation.zh: 开什么玩笑？

translation.en: How you... How you afford this joint?
translation.zh: 你怎么…住得起这里？

translation.en: Your family got it like that?
translation.zh: 你家里人出钱？

translation.en: -No, my parents are artists. -So are mine.
translation.zh:
-不 我父母是艺术家
-我父母也是

translation.en: -Really? -Well, yeah, my pops is an artist.
translation.zh:
-真的吗？
-是啊 我爸是艺术家

translation.en: A con artist?
translation.zh: 骗人艺术家？

translation.en: -[R&B music playing] -196... 197...
Go, Greer.
translation.zh: 好样的 格里尔

translation.en: ♪ I can take you to a good time ♪
translation.zh: （#格里尔柴尔斯）

translation.en: I'm the best thing that ever happened to Nola Darling.
translation.zh:
遇见我是诺拉达琳这辈子
最幸运的事

translation.en: Ask her. She'll tell you that herself. That woman worships me.
translation.zh:
你去问她 她也会这么说
那女人崇拜我

translation.en: What a pair. What a-- What a couple we make.
translation.zh: 我们多般配 多登对

translation.en: When we are together...
translation.zh: 当我们在一起

translation.en: ...it's on like hot buttered popcorn.
translation.zh: 就像干柴遇上烈火

translation.en: We are a dynamic duo.
translation.zh: 我们是黄金搭档

translation.en: A terrific twosome.
translation.zh: 天造地设的一对

translation.en: Legendary lovers.
translation.zh: 传奇情侣

translation.en: I can keep going if you wish, if you...
translation.zh: 你想听我可以一直说下去 如果你…

translation.en: ...if you so desire.
translation.zh: 如果你那么想听的话

translation.en: -♪ When you are not with me ♪ -Ah, Michael Jackson spin! -♪ I had to leave, I have to live ♪ -[growling]
translation.zh: 迈克尔杰克逊旋转

translation.en: I got a lion in my pocket, and, baby, he is ready to roar.
translation.zh:
我控制着一头狮子
它已经蠢蠢欲动了

translation.en: Was that the Cowardly Lion, or Snagglepuss even? Hm?
translation.zh: 是胆小狮 还是粉红狮？

translation.en: Can't no other dudes hit it the way I'm 'bout to now.
translation.zh:
待会儿让你感受一下
我前无古人的技术

translation.en: Greer, you're wallin'. Don't talk, okay?
translation.zh:
格里尔 你这就扫兴了
别说话 好吗？

translation.en: -[Greer] Oh, Nola! -[Nola] Greer!
translation.zh:
-诺拉
-格里尔

translation.en: -[Greer] Nola! Nola! Nola! -[Nola moaning]
translation.zh: 诺拉…

translation.en: -[Greer] Greer! -[Nola] What?
translation.zh:
-格里尔
-什么？

translation.en: Do you realize you are gazing upon the bi-racial Adonis?
translation.zh: 你知道你眼前的是个混血美男子吗？

translation.en: You know I'm fine as shit.
translation.zh: 你知道我特别帅

translation.en: Greer, you are the epitome of narcissism. Don't you get tired of you?
translation.zh:
格里尔 你就是自恋的代名词
你还没厌倦你自己吗？

translation.en: Never happen. Ugh.
translation.zh: 不可能的事

translation.en: I bet you love yourself more than Kanye loves Kanye.
translation.zh: 我敢打赌你比坎耶还自恋

translation.en: There's no crime in lovin' oneself.
translation.zh: 自恋又不犯法

translation.en: In fact, that is the greatest love of all. I can sing it like Whitney, if you wish.
translation.zh:
事实上 这是最伟大的爱
你想听的话我可以模仿惠特妮唱出来

translation.en: I don't wish.
translation.zh: 我不想听

translation.en: Ha! Voilà!
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: WDF, Nola! What da fuck?
translation.zh: 见鬼了 诺拉 这是什么鬼东西？

translation.en: What? It's your ugly inner self, Greer.
translation.zh: 怎么了？是你丑陋的内在 格里尔

translation.en: I call it Sexy Beast.
translation.zh: 我给它取名为《性感野兽》

translation.en: -No! -All right, you know the deal.
translation.zh:
不 好了 你知道规矩 该走了
我还要画画

translation.en: It's time to go. I got another piece to start.
translation.zh:
好了 你知道规矩 该走了
我还要画画

translation.en: Nola...
translation.zh: 诺拉

translation.en: With the tongue...
translation.zh: 那舌头…

translation.en: [muttering] Posin' all this damn time for this bullshit.
translation.zh: 我摆了那么久姿势就为了这破玩意

translation.en: It was almost good, Nola.
translation.zh: 这画本来挺好的 诺拉

translation.en: Bye, Greer.
translation.zh: 再见 格里尔

translation.en: Don't front, though.
translation.zh: 别口是心非了

translation.en: Ain't no dudes ever put it down the way I did today.
translation.zh: 你从没像今天这么欲仙欲死过

translation.en: Nola and I used to be roommates, until we had a slight falling out.
translation.zh:
我和诺拉本是室友
直到我们小吵了一架

translation.en: I can't lie, it was a big falling out.
translation.zh: 说小吵是骗人 我们大吵了一架

translation.en: We're still cool, still friends. We just can't live together.
translation.zh:
我们关系还好 还是朋友
只是没法再同住一个屋檐下

translation.en: And by the way, don't ask me anything about Mars Blackmon, ever.
translation.zh:
还有 别问我任何
有关火星布莱克蒙的事

translation.en: Off-limits.
translation.zh: 绝对禁止

translation.en: I'd get up early in the morning, on my way to Jivamukti Vinyasa class,
translation.zh:
我每天一大早起床
去上吉瓦穆提瑜伽课

translation.en: and I'd run into all these randos in our bathroom.
translation.zh: 总会在浴室碰上各种陌生人

translation.en: Nola!
translation.zh: 诺拉

translation.en: Not okay. Nola and I talked about it, but, like she said...
translation.zh: 受不了 我们谈过 但就像她说的…

translation.en: I found this crib, and if you can't hang, maybe you should start looking
translation.zh:
这地方是我找的 你要是受不了
也许你应该开始

translation.en: -for another place of residence. -Bye!
translation.zh:
-另找住处
-再见

translation.en: I said, "Bye," and I got my own brownstone apartment in Fort Greene.
translation.zh:
我撂下一句“再见”
在格林堡找了间自己的褐石屋公寓

translation.en: What could I do? Nola's name was on the lease. Regardless...
translation.zh:
我能怎么办？
租约上签的是诺拉的名字 无论如何

translation.en: Nola is still my girl.
translation.zh: 诺拉还是我的好闺蜜

translation.en: I'm carrying my entire portfolio on the C-train during rush hour.
translation.zh:
当时是上下班高峰
我带着作品集挤C线地铁

translation.en: And this dude bumps into me, like bam! Hard. I swear he did it on purpose.
translation.zh:
有个人撞了我一下 他绝对是故意的
撞得特别狠

translation.en: Knocks all of my drawings on the nasty subway floor.
translation.zh:
我的画全被他撞掉了
在脏兮兮的地铁里散了一地

translation.en: People were literally stepping on my fingers, pushing to get off the subway.
translation.zh: 人们就踩着我的手指挤出地铁

translation.en: I'm trying to pick up my shit. It's like I don't even exist.
translation.zh:
我只想把我的画捡起来
他们当我不存在一样

translation.en: -I would've lost it. -I get to my interview 15 minutes late.
translation.zh:
-换我就发脾气了
-结果面试迟到了15分钟

translation.en: I open up the portfolio. Footprints on all of my drawings.
translation.zh: 我打开作品集 画上全是脚印

translation.en: -[woman] No. -Oh, my God. What did you do?
translation.zh: 不 天啊 你怎么办？

translation.en: -I had to show 'em as is, so I freestyled. -[chuckling]
translation.zh:
那也得硬着头皮展示啊
所以我就自由发挥了

translation.en: I spit out everything I learned at Pratt Institute. I dug deep.
translation.zh:
我把在普瑞特艺术学院学的东西
全用上了

translation.en: By the end, I had them thinking the footprints
translation.zh:
到了最后
我成功让他们相信那些脚印

translation.en: were like some dope Basquiat conceptual touch.
translation.zh: 是类似巴斯奇亚的概念性创作

translation.en: -I love that. -Ladies.
translation.zh:
-我喜欢
-姑娘们

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: -Thank you. -Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: -What is this? -The Fo-Gre cucumber martini.
translation.zh:
-这是什么？
-格堡黄瓜马天尼

translation.en: This tastes like moonshine brewed in Bushwick.
translation.zh:
这个喝起来像是
布什维克的私酿威士忌

translation.en: Ma'am, it's what you ordered.
translation.zh: 女士 你点的就是这个

translation.en: This is not Goose. I can taste the $3 difference.
translation.zh:
这不是灰雁
价钱差了3美元 我喝得出来

translation.en: -Really? -Really.
translation.zh:
-真的吗？
-真的

translation.en: -Clo-- -No.
translation.zh:
-克罗…
-别说话

translation.en: Your beautiful beard
translation.zh: 你的漂亮大胡子

translation.en: and sense of entitlement do not intimidate me.
translation.zh: 和权利意识吓不到我

translation.en: -I'll be right back with your drink. -[Clo] Thank you.
translation.zh:
-我重新给你上一杯
-谢谢

-过去时
-你想让我怎么做？克罗

translation.en: Have you ever thought about givin' your coochie a rest?
translation.zh: 你没考虑过让你的阴道休息一下吗？

translation.en: What, my coochie gonna get up and file for workers' comp?
translation.zh:
怎么？我的阴道
会上诉要求劳工保险吗？

translation.en: -She ain't gonna get much. -[both laughing]
translation.zh: 拿不了几个钱

translation.en: I don't know, doesn't it get confusing, juggling all of them at the same time?
translation.zh:
同时周旋在那么多人中间
不会觉得困惑吗？

translation.en: Like, don't you get 'em... mixed up?
translation.zh: 你不会把他们搞混吗？

translation.en: No slip-ups yet.
translation.zh: 目前还没出过错

translation.en: Greer. He got that...
translation.zh: 格里尔 他…

translation.en: strong dick down game, right?
translation.zh: 会跟你玩刺激的吧？

translation.en: Mr. Dick-tator?
translation.zh: 阳具霸主先生？

translation.en: You forgot "dickologist."
translation.zh: 你忘了“阳具专家”

translation.en: How's your sugar daddy?
translation.zh: 那个干爹呢？

translation.en: -Um... he's not my sugar daddy. -Color it in for me.
translation.zh:
-他不是我的干爹
-说说看

translation.en: He takes care of me. Next question.
translation.zh: 他很照顾我 下一个问题

translation.en: How's your artwork coming? Pun intended.
translation.zh: 你的作品怎么样了？这是双关

translation.en: It's coming. No pun intended.
translation.zh: 快好了 不是双关

translation.en: I know you live down the block, but call me.
translation.zh:
我知道你就住街那头
但记得给我打电话

translation.en: -Love you. -Love you more.
translation.zh:
-爱你
-我也是

translation.en: -Call me when you get home. -Thanks, Mom.
translation.zh:
-到家给我打电话
-谢了 老妈

translation.en: -Welcome, sweetie. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 不客气 宝贝

translation.en: [man] Sexy! Sexy, what's your name, girl?
translation.zh: 美女…你叫什么？

translation.en: [Nola] Can I help you? God.
translation.zh: 需要帮忙吗？天啊

translation.en: [man] Yo! Yo, ma! Yo, ma!
translation.zh: 喂…小妞

translation.en: My parents gave me a name, and it ain't "Yo, ma!"
translation.zh:
我父母给我起的名字
不叫“喂 小妞”

translation.en: -Bitch, I'm tryin' to talk to you! -Get the fuck off of me!
translation.zh:
贱人 我在跟你说话 -放手
-冷静点 姑娘

translation.en: -Chill, girl. -Get your motherfuckin' hands off of me!
translation.zh:
-放手
-冷静点 姑娘 -把你的脏手拿开
-冷静

translation.en: -[panting] -Fuck you, then!
translation.zh: 去你的

translation.en: -[running footsteps] -I don't want that stank pussy anyway!
translation.zh: 我反正也不想碰你的脏下体

translation.en: Motherfuckin' black bitch! Fuck! Shit!
translation.zh: 混账黑贱人 该死 可恶

translation.en: You ever heard of Akira Kurosawa?
translation.zh: 你听说过黑泽明吗？

translation.en: Well, you should.
translation.zh: 你应该听过

translation.en: Kurosawa is one of the all-time masters of cinema, Japanese director.
translation.zh: 黑泽明是一位电影巨匠 日本导演

translation.en: One of my favorite Kurosawa joints
translation.zh: 我最喜欢的黑泽明电影

translation.en: is Rashomon.
translation.zh: 是《罗生门》

translation.en: That film came out in 1951,
translation.zh: 那部电影发行于1951年

translation.en: shot in beautiful black-and-white photography.
translation.zh: 是部很美的黑白片

translation.en: It's about a rape, a murder,
translation.zh: 影片讲述了一场强奸 一场凶杀

translation.en: and several witnesses who all saw the same crime, but from entirely different viewpoints.
translation.zh:
几个目击者从截然不同的视角
目睹了这场犯罪

translation.en: Some might say I have a Rashomon effect on Jamie, Greer, and Mars.
translation.zh:
有人可能会说 我和詹米
格里尔和火星的关系就像《罗生门》

translation.en: They all view me differently,
translation.zh: 他们眼中的我各不相同

translation.en: but I will not allow them to paint my life, paint who I am.
translation.zh:
但我不会让他们描绘我的生活
描绘我这个人

translation.en: I'm dealin' with who I am now, at this moment in time and space.
translation.zh: 在此时此地 我在寻找自我

translation.en: And I gotta look within to feel what makes me happy.
translation.zh:
我必须审视内心
寻找能让我感到快乐的东西

translation.en: And if Jamie, Greer, and Mars wanna deal with me,
translation.zh:
如果詹米、格里尔和火星
想跟我一起玩

translation.en: it's gotta be on my own terms.
translation.zh: 就得按我的意思来

translation.en: No less, no more.
translation.zh: 我不让步 也不奢求

translation.en: And anyone who can't get with the program can step.
translation.zh: 任何人受不了就走人

translation.en: Go with God.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: One, two, or three fingers cannot block out the sun.
translation.zh: 一二三根手指是遮不住太阳的

translation.en: The truth is the truth.
translation.zh: 事实就是事实

translation.en: I'm not a freak, I'm not a sex addict, and I'm damn sure nobody's property.
translation.zh:
我不是怪胎 不是性瘾者
也绝对不是任何人的财产

translation.en: [Nola] My name isn't Dime Piece.
translation.zh: 我的名字不是尤物

translation.en: My name isn't Boo.
translation.zh: 我的名字不是美女

translation.en: My name isn't Baby Gurl.
translation.zh: 我的名字不是小宝贝

translation.en: My name isn't Pssst Shawty.
translation.zh: 我的名字不是“喂 美眉”

translation.en: My name isn't Mamacita.
translation.zh: 我的名字不是辣妞

translation.en: My name isn't Sweetie.
translation.zh: 我的名字不是小甜甜

translation.en: My name isn't Ay Yo Ma.
translation.zh: 我的名字不是“喂 小妞”

translation.en: My name isn't Sexy Sexy Sexy.
translation.zh: 我的名字不是性感美人

translation.en: My name isn't Hoochie Mama.
translation.zh: 我的名字不是荡妇

translation.en: My name isn't Honey.
translation.zh: 我的名字不是亲爱的

translation.en: My name isn't Sweetheart.
translation.zh: 我的名字不是甜心

translation.en: And my name definitely ain't no "Muthafuckin' Black Bitch."
translation.zh: 我的名字也绝对不是混账黑贱人

translation.en: My name is Nola Darling.
translation.zh: 我的名字是诺拉达琳

translation.en: Peace, two fingers.
translation.zh: 和平 竖两根手指
